items.headline: Mastering Mobile development and Integration
objectives_summary: On completion of this course, you would be able to develop your mobile applications with Google Dart.
You could integrate various Amazon services from AWS cloud with Mobile integration.
Could perform Mobile App Testing with Device Farm.

items.headline: Mobile Development using iOS 11 and Swift 4 - From basic to advanced programming - Ready for App Store
objectives_summary: Once you complete the course you can build iOS Applications and submit to Apple AppStore
Understand all the components of programming and iOS Development
Build Advanced Mobile Apps targeting iOS Platforms - iPhone and iPads

Basics of programming
How to install Xcode

items.title: Xamarin iOS Uber Clone App with C# and Firebase (2020)
items.headline: Learn advanced Xamarin iOS concepts by building a fully complete and functional Uber Clone app using Firebase with C#
objectives_summary: Learn to build complete iOS Uber Clone apps (driver and passenger) with C#, Xamarin and Firebase
Save and Retrieve data locally using UserDefaults
Learn to find direction from one point to the other with Google Direction Api

items.title: Maintain Android Apps with Jetpack Architecture Components
items.headline: Utilize Android Jetpack Architecture components to make your Android application development flexible and maintainable
objectives_summary: Use the Data Binding library to bind data to the UI
Provide stability in your app by handling life cycles, view models, and live data
Implement effective in-app navigation by using the Navigation architecture component

items.title: Icon Animations in Android Applications - Complete Course

objectives_summary: Clean, Smooth and Professional Animations

Learn how to use Shapeshifter

objectives_summary: Dagger2
Dependency injection
Understand the architectural importance of DI

items.title: HTML5 Mobile Apps: Create an App for iPhone, iPad & Android

objectives_summary: Setup and install the app development environment in Intel's XDK App Development Tool
Create a new project in Intel XDK
Using the Virtual Device Emulator within Intel XDK
